alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:00PM CDT until August 03 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Richwoods, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cedar Hill Lakes, Old Mines, Richwoods, Dittmer, Lonedell, Fletcher, Morse Mill, Grubville and Oermann. This also includes Washington State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
